name: Lago
long_description:
Lago is the open-source alternative to Stripe, with a laser focus on transparency, metering, developer experience, and composability: addressing complex pricing grids and business workflows.

Their team previously built and scaled the home-grown billing system of Qonto (a $5B Fintech in Europe), from pre-launch to the tens of millions of MRR. 

Lago is the leading open-source repository and community in this space.
one_liner: Open Source Metering and Usage Based Billing

name: Kable
long_description:
Kable makes it easy for developers to add usage-based billing, invoicing, analytics, and authentication to their API products with just three lines of code.

We help API companies bring their products to market faster, more securely, and with flexible billing tools that help businesses scale. We provide everything needed to create a delightful experience for developer communities and to optimize revenue while giving time back to engineering teams to focus on what matters most.

name: Health Harbor
long_description:
We use generative AI to call insurance on behalf of healthcare clinics. We save clinics up to 40 hours of calls every week over existing outsourced human solutions. 

Compared to the existing solutions for benefits verifications: 
- We're faster -- by default, we have a turnaround of 24 hours compared to typically a 3 day turnaround for competitors
- We can reach more payors -- as long as they have a phone line, we can support calling them for benefits. There's quite a few payors in both medical and dental (e.g. Seledent) that have yet to offer a digital retrieval of benefits
- We're reliable and consistent -- there is no person-to-person variation or question skipping when it comes to working with software
one_liner: Using generative AI to call insurance for healthcare clinics

name: Decoda Health
long_description:
Medical practices struggle with front desk shortages and nonstop admin work—ringing phones, scheduling mishaps, intake errors, and billing headaches. The result? Overworked staff and less time for patient care.

Decoda Health’s AI platform takes over 80% of these tedious tasks, handling calls, scheduling, and payments while alerting staff only when necessary. By reducing chaos and streamlining operations, teams can focus on what truly matters—providing exceptional patient care.
one_liner: AI-powered platform automating medical practice operations

name: Lumen Payments
one_liner: Ship AI billing fast - track usage, credits & flexible pricing models!

name: LedgerUp
long_description: LedgerUp is your AI billing teammate for B2B SaaS, transforming contract-based billing from a chore into a frictionless, revenue-accelerating process. We parse contracts, issue invoices, and collect payments in real-time, all while surfacing actionable analytics, allowing your finance team to escape spreadsheet chaos and focus on strategic growth. Just close deals and let us handle your billing for you.
one_liner: Your AI teammate that handles all billing and revenue from Slack

name: Autumn
long_description:
Autumn is open-source infrastructure over Stripe that allows AI startups to build their pricing plans quickly, and flexibly. We act as your app's DB and manage who's paying for what, track usage and manage customer feature access.

YC companies use us because we make it easy to handle common pricing models like usage-based, credits, subscriptions, rollovers and more in 3 functions and no webhooks. 

As you scale, you get reliable billing, that you can change however you want without wrangling code (we handle versioning, migrations etc), and manage custom pricing too. Everything you could down the line (credits, multiple subscription groups, rollovers, referral program, usage analytics, centralized team billing etc), you can drop in at any point.

name: Chorrie
long_description: Chorrie provides healthcare RCM automation using AI browser agents to handle the busywork of heavily-manual processes like medical coding, billing, insurance followup, and more.  Using the latest models and custom automation tools tailored specifically for the provider's needs, Chorrie brings scalable automation to healthcare practices so they can focus on what matters.

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark provides AI Agents to solve billing issues for subscription companies.

Teams currently spend tens of hours every week dealing with billing support inquiries and tackling issues like fraud and chargebacks. Our Agents automate all of this work for them by integrating with their existing systems. 

The result: lower support costs, happier customers, and more recovered revenue.

name: Skope
long_description: We’re building a billing system, for AI companies. We support every standard type of pricing model (usage, subscription, hybrid, etc) and are excited to be the first to natively support outcome-based pricing. For the first time ever, AI companies can bill their customers exactly the way they want to be billed.
one_liner: A modern billing system for AI-native companies.

name: Paloma
long_description: Paloma is an AI copilot and system of record for renewals, expansions, and billing. It connects to your contracts, CRM, usage data and customer communications to surface revenue opportunities, flag churn risks and automatically update billing. With billing as its foundation, Paloma becomes the single source of truth for post-sales revenue, eliminating leakage and manual work.
one_liner: AI copilot and system of record for renewals, expansions, and billing
